00015 template<typename ST, typename DT> bool try_cast( const ST &source, DT &dest )
00016 {
00017     bool ret = true;
00018 
00019     try {
00020         dest = boost::lexical_cast<DT>( source );
00021     } catch ( boost::bad_lexical_cast e ) {
00022         ret = false;
00023     }
00024 
00025     return ret;
00026 }

00028 template<typename T> std::list<T> dcmtkListString2list( DcmElement *elem )
00029 {
00030     OFString buff;
00031     elem->getOFStringArray( buff );
00032     return util::stringToList<T>( std::string( buff.c_str() ), '\\' );

00043 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseAS( DcmElement *elem, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00044 {
00045     uint16_t duration = 0;
00046     OFString buff;
00047     elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00048     static boost::numeric::converter <
00049     uint16_t, double,
00050             boost::numeric::conversion_traits<uint16_t, double>,
00051             boost::numeric::def_overflow_handler,
00052             boost::numeric::RoundEven<double>
00053             > double2uint16;
00054 
00055     if ( _internal::try_cast( buff.substr( 0, buff.find_last_of( "0123456789" ) + 1 ), duration ) ) {
00056         switch ( buff.at( buff.size() - 1 ) ) {
00057         case 'D':
00058         case 'd':
00059             break;
00060         case 'W':
00061         case 'w':
00062             duration *= 7;
00063             break;
00064         case 'M':
00065         case 'm':
00066             duration = double2uint16( 30.436875 * duration ); // year/12
00067             break;
00068         case 'Y':
00069         case 'y':
00070             duration = double2uint16( 365.2425 * duration ); //mean length of a year
00071             break;
00072         default:
00073             LOG( Runtime, warning )
00074                     << "Missing age-type-letter, assuming days";
00075         }
00076 
00077         map.propertyValue( name ) = duration;
00078         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00079                 << "Parsed age for " << name << "(" <<  buff << ")"
00080                 << " as " << duration << " days";
00081     } else
00082         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00083                 << "Cannot parse age string \"" << buff << "\" in the field \"" << name << "\"";
00084 }
00085 
00095 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseDA( DcmElement *elem, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00096 {
00097     //@todo if we drop support for old yyyy.mm.dd this would be much easier
00098     boost::regex reg( "^([[:digit:]]{4})\\.?([[:digit:]]{2})\\.?([[:digit:]]{2})$" );
00099     boost::cmatch results;
00100     OFString buff;
00101     elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00102 
00103     if ( boost::regex_match( buff.c_str(), results, reg ) ) {
00104         const boost::gregorian::date date(
00105             boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( results.str( 1 ) ), //year
00106             boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( results.str( 2 ) ), //month
00107             boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( results.str( 3 ) ) //day of month
00108         );
00109         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00110                 << "Parsed date for " << name << "(" <<  buff << ")" << " as " << date;
00111         map.propertyValue( name ) = date;
00112     } else
00113         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00114                 << "Cannot parse Date string \"" << buff << "\" in the field \"" << name << "\"";
00115 }

00136 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseTM( DcmElement *elem, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00137 {
00138     short shift = 0;
00139     OFString buff;
00140     bool ok = true;
00141     boost::posix_time::time_duration time;
00142     elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00143 
00144     // Insert the ":" -- make it hh:mm:ss.frac
00145     if ( buff.at( 2 ) != ':' ) {
00146         buff.insert( 2, 1, ':' );
00147         shift++;
00148     }
00149 
00150     if ( ( buff.size() > size_t( 4 + shift ) ) && ( buff.at( 4 + shift ) != ':' ) ) {
00151         buff.insert( 4 + shift, 1, ':' );
00152         shift++;
00153     }
00154 
00155     //Try standard-parser for hh:mm:ss.frac
00156     try {
00157         time = boost::posix_time::duration_from_string( buff.c_str() );
00158         ok = not time.is_not_a_date_time();
00159     } catch ( std::logic_error e ) {
00160         ok = false;
00161     }
00162 
00163     if ( ok ) {
00164         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00165                 << "Parsed time for " << name << "(" <<  buff << ")" << " as " << time;
00166         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::posix_time::ptime( boost::gregorian::date( 1400, 1, 1 ), time );
00167         //although TM is defined as time of day we dont have a day here, so we fake one
00168     } else
00169         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00170                 << "Cannot parse Time string \"" << buff << "\" in the field \"" << name << "\"";
00171 }

00173 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseScalar( DcmElement *elem, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00174 {
00175     OFString buff;
00176 
00177     switch ( elem->getVR() ) {
00178     case EVR_AS: { // age string (nnnD, nnnW, nnnM, nnnY)
00179         parseAS( elem, name, map );
00180     }
00181     break;
00182     case EVR_DA: {
00183         parseDA( elem, name, map );
00184     }
00185     break;
00186     case EVR_TM: {
00187         parseTM( elem, name, map );
00188     }
00189     break;
00190     case EVR_FL: {
00191         Float32 buff;
00192         elem->getFloat32( buff );
00193         map.setPropertyAs<float>( name, buff ); //if Float32 is float its fine, if not we will get an compiler error here
00194     }
00195     break;
00196     case EVR_FD: {
00197         Float64 buff;
00198         elem->getFloat64( buff );
00199         map.setPropertyAs<double>( name, buff ); //if Float64 is double its fine, if not we will get an compiler error here
00200     }
00201     break;
00202     case EVR_DS: { //Decimal String (can be floating point)
00203         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00204         map.setPropertyAs<double>( name, boost::lexical_cast<double>( buff ) );
00205     }
00206     break;
00207     case EVR_SL: { //signed long
00208         Sint32 buff;
00209         elem->getSint32( buff );
00210         map.setPropertyAs<int32_t>( name, buff ); //seems like Sint32 is not allways int32_t, so enforce it
00211     }
00212     break;
00213     case EVR_SS: { //signed short
00214         Sint16 buff;
00215         elem->getSint16( buff );
00216         map.setPropertyAs<int16_t>( name, buff );
00217     }
00218     break;
00219     case EVR_UL: { //unsigned long
00220         Uint32 buff;
00221         elem->getUint32( buff );
00222         map.setPropertyAs<uint32_t>( name, buff );
00223     }
00224     break;
00225     case EVR_US: { //unsigned short
00226         Uint16 buff;
00227         elem->getUint16( buff );
00228         map.setPropertyAs<uint16_t>( name, buff );
00229     }
00230     break;
00231     case EVR_IS: { //integer string
00232         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00233         map.setPropertyAs<int32_t>( name, boost::lexical_cast<int32_t>( buff ) );
00234     }
00235     break;
00236     case EVR_AE: //Application Entity (string)
00237     case EVR_CS: // Code String (string)
00238     case EVR_LT: //long text
00239     case EVR_SH: //short string
00240     case EVR_LO: //long string
00241     case EVR_ST: //short text
00242     case EVR_UT: //Unlimited Text
00243     case EVR_UI: //Unique Identifier [0-9\.]
00244     case EVR_PN: { //Person Name
00245         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00246         map.setPropertyAs<std::string>( name, boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( buff ) );
00247     }
00248     break;
00249     default: {
00250         elem->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00251         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Implement me "
00252                              << name << "("
00253                              << const_cast<DcmTag &>( elem->getTag() ).getVRName() << "):"
00254                              << buff;
00255     }
00256     break;
00257     }
00258 }

00260 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseVector( DcmElement *elem, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00261 {
00262     OFString buff;
00263     size_t len = elem->getVM();
00264 
00265     switch ( elem->getVR() ) {
00266     case EVR_FL: {
00267         Float32 *buff;
00268         elem->getFloat32Array( buff );
00269         util::fvector4 vector;
00270         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00271         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector; //if Float32 is float its fine, if not we will get an linker error here
00272     }
00273     break;
00274     case EVR_FD: {
00275         Float64 *buff;
00276         elem->getFloat64Array( buff );
00277         util::dvector4 vector;
00278         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00279         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector; //if Float64 is double its fine, if not we will get an linker error here
00280     }
00281     break;
00282     case EVR_IS: {
00283         const util::ilist tokens = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<int>( elem );
00284         util::ivector4 vector;
00285         vector.copyFrom( tokens.begin(), tokens.end() );
00286         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00287     }
00288     break;
00289     case EVR_SL: {
00290         Sint32 *buff;
00291         elem->getSint32Array( buff );
00292         util::ivector4 vector;
00293         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00294         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00295     }
00296     break;
00297     case EVR_US: {
00298         Uint16 *buff;
00299         elem->getUint16Array( buff );
00300         util::ivector4 vector;
00301         vector.copyFrom( buff, buff + len );
00302         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00303     }
00304     break;
00305     case EVR_CS: // Code String (string)
00306     case EVR_SH: //short string
00307     case EVR_ST: { //short text
00308         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<std::string>( elem );
00309     }
00310     break;
00311     case EVR_DS: {
00312         const util::dlist tokens = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<double>( elem );
00313         util::dvector4 vector;
00314         vector.copyFrom( tokens.begin(), tokens.end() );
00315         map.propertyValue( name ) = vector;
00316     }
00317     break;
00318     case EVR_AS:
00319     case EVR_DA:
00320     case EVR_TM:
00321     case EVR_SS:
00322     case EVR_UL:
00323     case EVR_AE: //Application Entity (string)
00324     case EVR_LT: //long text
00325     case EVR_LO: //long string
00326     case EVR_UT: //Unlimited Text
00327     case EVR_UI: //Unique Identifier [0-9\.]
00328     case EVR_PN:
00329     default: {
00330         elem->getOFStringArray( buff );
00331         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Implement me "
00332                              << name << "("
00333                              << const_cast<DcmTag &>( elem->getTag() ).getVRName() << "):"
00334                              << buff;
00335     }
00336     break;
00337     }
00338 
00339     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Parsed the vector " << name << " as " << map.propertyValue( name );
00340 }

00342 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseList( DcmElement *elem, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, util::PropertyMap &map )
00343 {
00344     OFString buff;
00345     size_t len = elem->getVM();
00346 
00347     switch ( elem->getVR() ) {
00348     case EVR_FL: {
00349         Float32 *buff;
00350         elem->getFloat32Array( buff );
00351         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::dlist( buff, buff + len );
00352     }
00353     break;
00354     case EVR_FD: {
00355         Float64 *buff;
00356         elem->getFloat64Array( buff );
00357         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::dlist( buff, buff + len );
00358     }
00359     break;
00360     case EVR_IS: {
00361         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<int>( elem );
00362     }
00363     break;
00364     case EVR_SL: {
00365         Sint32 *buff;
00366         elem->getSint32Array( buff );
00367         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::ilist( buff, buff + len );
00368     }
00369     break;
00370     case EVR_US: {
00371         Uint16 *buff;
00372         elem->getUint16Array( buff );
00373         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::ilist( buff, buff + len );
00374     }
00375     break;
00376     case EVR_CS: // Code String (string)
00377     case EVR_SH: //short string
00378     case EVR_ST: { //short text
00379         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<std::string>( elem );
00380     }
00381     break;
00382     case EVR_DS: {
00383         map.propertyValue( name ) = _internal::dcmtkListString2list<double>( elem );
00384     }
00385     break;
00386     case EVR_AS:
00387     case EVR_DA:
00388     case EVR_TM:
00389     case EVR_SS:
00390     case EVR_UL:
00391     case EVR_AE: //Application Entity (string)
00392     case EVR_LT: //long text
00393     case EVR_LO: //long string
00394     case EVR_UT: //Unlimited Text
00395     case EVR_UI: //Unique Identifier [0-9\.]
00396     case EVR_PN:
00397     default: {
00398         elem->getOFStringArray( buff );
00399         LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Implement me "
00400                              << name << "("
00401                              << const_cast<DcmTag &>( elem->getTag() ).getVRName() << "):"
00402                              << buff;
00403     }
00404     break;
00405     }
00406 
00407     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Parsed the list " << name << " as " << map.propertyValue( name );
00408 }

00410 void ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSA( DcmElement *elem, util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect )
00411 {
00412     Uint8 *array;
00413     elem->getUint8Array( array );
00414     const size_t len = elem->getLength();
00415 
00416     for ( std::string::size_type pos = 0x10; pos < ( len - sizeof( Sint32 ) ); ) {
00417         pos += parseCSAEntry( array + pos, map, dialect );
00418     }
00419 }
00420 size_t ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSAEntry( Uint8 *at, util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect )
00421 {
00422     size_t pos = 0;
00423     const char *const name = ( char * )at + pos;
00424     pos += 0x40;
00425     assert( name[0] );
00426     /*Sint32 &vm=*((Sint32*)array+pos);*/
00427     pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00428     const char *const vr = ( char * )at + pos;
00429     pos += 0x4;
00430     /*Sint32 syngodt=endian<Uint8,Uint32>(array+pos);*/
00431     pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00432     const Sint32 nitems = endian<Uint8, Uint32>( at + pos );
00433     pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00434 
00435     if ( nitems ) {
00436         pos += sizeof( Sint32 ); //77
00437         util::slist ret;
00438 
00439         for ( unsigned short n = 0; n < nitems; n++ ) {
00440             Sint32 len = endian<Uint8, Uint32>( at + pos );
00441             pos += sizeof( Sint32 );//the length of this element
00442             pos += 3 * sizeof( Sint32 ); //whatever
00443 
00444             if ( !len )continue;
00445 
00446             if( (
00447                     std::string( "MrPhoenixProtocol" ) != name  && std::string( "MrEvaProtocol" ) != name && std::string( "MrProtocol" ) != name
00448                 ) || dialect == "withExtProtocols" ) {
00449                 std::string insert( ( char * )at + pos );
00450                 const std::string whitespaces( " \t\f\v\n\r" );
00451                 const std::string::size_type start = insert.find_first_not_of( whitespaces );
00452 
00453                 if ( insert.empty() || start == std::string::npos ) {
00454                     LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "Skipping empty string for CSA entry " << name;
00455                 } else {
00456                     const std::string::size_type end = insert.find_last_not_of( whitespaces ); //strip spaces
00457 
00458                     if( end == std::string::npos )
00459                         ret.push_back( insert.substr( start, insert.size() - start ) ); //store the text if there is some
00460                     else
00461                         ret.push_back( insert.substr( start, end + 1 - start ) );//store the text if there is some
00462                 }
00463             } else {
00464                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Skipping " << name << " as its not requested by the dialect (use dialect \"withExtProtocols\" to get it)";
00465             }
00466 
00467             pos += (
00468                        ( len + sizeof( Sint32 ) - 1 ) / sizeof( Sint32 )
00469                    ) *
00470                    sizeof( Sint32 );//increment pos by len aligned to sizeof(Sint32)*/
00471         }
00472 
00473         try {
00474             util::PropertyMap::PropPath path;
00475             path.push_back( name );
00476 
00477             if ( ret.size() == 1 ) {
00478                 if ( parseCSAValue( ret.front(), path , vr, map ) ) {
00479                     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Found scalar entry " << path << ":" << map.propertyValue( path ) << " in CSA header";
00480                 }
00481             } else if ( ret.size() > 1 ) {
00482                 if ( parseCSAValueList( ret, path, vr, map ) ) {
00483                     LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Found list entry " << path << ":" << map.propertyValue( path ) << " in CSA header";
00484                 }
00485             }
00486         } catch ( boost::bad_lexical_cast e ) {
00487             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Failed to parse CSA entry " << std::make_pair( name, ret ) << " as " << vr << " (" << e.what() << ")";
00488         }
00489     } else {
00490         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Skipping empty CSA entry " << name;
00491         pos += sizeof( Sint32 );
00492     }
00493 
00494     return pos;
00495 }
00496 
00497 bool ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSAValue( const std::string &val, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, const util::istring &vr, util::PropertyMap &map )
00498 {
00499     if ( vr == "IS" or vr == "SL" ) {
00500         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<int32_t>( val );
00501     } else if ( vr == "UL" ) {
00502         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<uint32_t>( val );
00503     } else if ( vr == "CS" or vr == "LO" or vr == "SH" or vr == "UN" or vr == "ST" ) {
00504         map.propertyValue( name ) = val;
00505     } else if ( vr == "DS" or vr == "FD" ) {
00506         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<double>( val );
00507     } else if ( vr == "US" ) {
00508         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<uint16_t>( val );
00509     } else if ( vr == "SS" ) {
00510         map.propertyValue( name ) = boost::lexical_cast<int16_t>( val );
00511     } else {
00512         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Dont know how to parse CSA entry " << std::make_pair( name, val ) << " type is " << util::MSubject( vr );
00513         return false;
00514     }
00515 
00516     return true;
00517 }
00518 bool ImageFormat_Dicom::parseCSAValueList( const util::slist &val, const util::PropertyMap::PropPath &name, const util::istring &vr, util::PropertyMap &map )
00519 {
00520     if ( vr == "IS" or vr == "SL" or vr == "US" or vr == "SS" ) {
00521         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::listToList<int32_t>( val.begin(), val.end() );
00522     } else if ( vr == "UL" ) {
00523         map.propertyValue( name ) = val; // @todo we dont have an unsigned int list
00524     } else if ( vr == "LO" or vr == "SH" or vr == "UN" or vr == "ST" or vr == "SL" ) {
00525         map.propertyValue( name ) = val;
00526     } else if ( vr == "DS" or vr == "FD" ) {
00527         map.propertyValue( name ) = util::listToList<double>( val.begin(), val.end() );
00528     } else {
00529         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Don't know how to parse CSA entry " << std::make_pair( name, val ) << " type is " << util::MSubject( vr );
00530         return false;
00531     }
00532 
00533     return true;
00534 }
00535 
00536 void ImageFormat_Dicom::dcmObject2PropMap( DcmObject *master_obj, util::PropertyMap &map, const std::string &dialect )const
00537 {
00538     for ( DcmObject *obj = master_obj->nextInContainer( NULL ); obj; obj = master_obj->nextInContainer( obj ) ) {
00539         const DcmTagKey &tag = obj->getTag();
00540 
00541         if ( tag == DcmTagKey( 0x7fe0, 0x0010 ) )
00542             continue;//skip the image data
00543         else if ( tag == DcmTagKey( 0x0029, 0x1010 ) ) { //CSAImageHeaderInfo
00544             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using " << tag.toString() << " as CSAImageHeaderInfo";
00545             DcmElement *elem = dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj );
00546             parseCSA( elem, map.branch( "CSAImageHeaderInfo" ), dialect );
00547         } else if ( tag == DcmTagKey( 0x0029, 0x1020 ) ) { //CSASeriesHeaderInfo
00548             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Using " << tag.toString() << " as CSASeriesHeaderInfo";
00549             DcmElement *elem = dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj );
00550             parseCSA( elem, map.branch( "CSASeriesHeaderInfo" ), dialect );
00551         } else if ( tag == DcmTagKey( 0x0029, 0x0020 ) ) { //MedComHistoryInformation
00552             //@todo special handling needed
00553             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Ignoring MedComHistoryInformation at " << tag.toString();
00554         } else if ( obj->isLeaf() ) { // common case
00555             if ( obj->getTag() == DcmTag( 0x0008, 0x0032 ) ) {
00556                 OFString buff;
00557                 dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj )->getOFString( buff, 0 );
00558 
00559                 if( buff.length() < 8 ) {
00560                     LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "The Acquisition Time " << util::MSubject( buff ) << " is not precise enough, ignoring it";
00561                     continue;
00562                 }
00563             }
00564 
00565             DcmElement *elem = dynamic_cast<DcmElement *>( obj );
00566             const size_t mult = obj->getVM();
00567 
00568             if ( mult == 0 )
00569                 LOG( Runtime, verbose_info ) << "Skipping empty Dicom-Tag " << util::MSubject( tag2Name( tag ) );
00570             else if ( mult == 1 )
00571                 parseScalar( elem, tag2Name( tag ), map );
00572             else if ( mult <= 4 )
00573                 parseVector( elem, tag2Name( tag ), map );
00574             else
00575                 parseList( elem, tag2Name( tag ), map ); // for any other value
00576         } else {
00577             dcmObject2PropMap( obj, map.branch( tag2Name( tag ) ), dialect );
00578         }
00579     }
00580 }
00581 
00582 }
00583 }
